code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function User(props){const navigate=useNavigate();function deleteUser(){(async()=>{await axios.delete('http://localhost:8800/user/'+props.userid);})();}function goToUpdate(){navigate('/update-user/'+props.userid);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"user-profile",className:"user-profile",src:props.userprofile,alt:"profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:props.username})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"icons/edit.png",width:"25px",alt:"edit",onClick:goToUpdate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"icons/delete.png",width:"25px",alt:"delete",onClick:deleteUser})]})]});}export default User;
